description.en: A package containing 15 Upcut Stone, 10 Vital Drink X or Refresher Hold, 5 Scroll of Amplification ES, 20 Blinkwing of Madrigal, 3 Activition and a Magic Broom for Beginners (7 Days). All items are also linked.
description.ar: A package containing 15 Upcut Stone, 10 Vital Drink X or Refresher Hold, 5 Scroll of Amplification ES, 20 Blinkwing of Madrigal, 3 Activition and a Magic Broom for Beginners (7 Days). All items are also linked.
description.br: Um pacote contendo Pedra Mágica (x15), Revigorante X (x10) ou Poção Suprema (x10), Pergaminho de Amplificação ES (x5), Teleporte de Madrigal (x20), Activition (x3) e uma Vassoura Mágica para Iniciantes de 7 dias. Todos os itens são ligados à alma.
description.cns: 一个包含15个力量之石、10个无敌活力多或者无敌魔力多、5个ES经验加成卷轴、20个万能翅膀、3个无敌技能券和为新手准备的魔法扫帚(7天)。所有物品都是角色绑定的。
description.de: Ein Paket mit 15 Upcut Stone, 10 Vitaldrink X oder Refresher Hold, 5 Scroll of Experience ES, 20 Blinkwing of Madrigal, 3 Activition und einen Magic Broom for Beginner (7 Tage). Alle Items sind auch gebunden.

description.fr: Paquet qui contient 15 Pierres de Mars, 10 Boissons Énergétique X ou Fioles de Mana X, 5 Parchemins de Maîtrise ES, 20 Élytres de Madrigal, 3 Elixirs de combo et un Balai Magique pour débutant (7 Jours). Tous les objets seront liés à votre personnage.
description.id: Paket yang berisi 15 Upcut Stone, 10 Vital Drink X atau Refresher Hold, 5 Scroll of Amplification ES, 20 Blinkwing of Madrigal, 3 Activition dan Magic Broom for Beginners (7 Days). Semua item saling berhubungan.

description.jp: パワーストーンx15、バイタルドリンクXx10または魔力ドリンクゴールド、戦神の巻物ESx5、ブリンクウィング（マドリガル）x20、アクティビジョンマジックブルームビギナーズ（7日）x3が含まれたパッケージ。アイテムは全て帰属です。

description.sp: Un Paquete con 15 Piedra Recortadora, 10 Bebida Vital X o Retendor de actualización, 5 Pergamino de Amplificación ES, 20 Ala Parpadeante de Madrigal, 3 Activisión y 1 Escoba Mágica de Principiantes (7 Days). Todos los artículos son Vinculados.

description.th: แพ็คเกจที่ประกอบด้วย Upcut Stone 15 ชิ้น, Vital Drink X 10 ชิ้น หรือ Refresher Hold, Scroll of Amplification ES 5 ชิ้น, Blinkwing of Madrigal 20 ชิ้น, Activition 3 ชิ้น และ Magic Broom สำหรับผู้เล่นใหม่ (7 วัน)ไอเทมทั้งหมดผูกมัด
description.tw: 一個包含 15 力量之石、10 活力多X或無限技能飲、5經驗加成卷軸、20瑪德利賈回卷、3 無敵技能卷、和初學者的魔法掃帚（7天）的禮盒。所有物品都是歸屬的。
description.vi: Một gói chứa 15 Upcut Stone, 10 Vital Drink X hoặc Refresher Hold, 5 Scroll of Amplification ES, 20 Blinkwing of Madrigal, 3 Activition và Magic Broom cho người mới bắt đầu (7 ngày). Tất cả các vật phẩm đều là Soul-Linked.
